long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Links can be used to save links from any website of your choice. Be it saving a list of contacts from LinkedIn or saving your shopping list, you are just a single click while using Save Links Chrome Extension.
